response.overview: Our surroundings are not just static backdrops—they are dynamic units of time and space, quietly carrying us through the imperceptible temporal flow of life. Eternal Habitat explores the profound connection between humans and the living spaces that shape them. Through a seamless spatial experience the film reveals the subtle, unspoken movement of space through time. It invites viewers to reflect on the interplay between the environments we inhabit, the transformations they undergo, and the fleeting moments of our lives spent within them.
response.title: Eternal Habitat
